trackinfo.title: no matter the outcome i will always be frail because that's how they made me
trackinfo.lyrics:
no matter the outcome i will always be frail because that's how they made me 
everything ive accomplished i was not supposed to achieve

trackinfo.title: surface level consumerism carved into my skin
trackinfo.lyrics:
I, genuinely hurt myself by trying my best
who my voice was who i was who i am i can't fucking try anymore
i keep trying to try but i can't 
i've lost my voice by creating it by using it

trackinfo.title: tainted eve from the binding of isaac repentance
quetiapine!!!!
trackinfo.lyrics:
her wings were lost tattered and scathed when she found me it did not take long to realize she was me
cried stained tears sitting besides flora i have never seen

trackinfo.title: sorry i love u
trackinfo.lyrics:
my heart is nowhere to be found and it is you that threw it away 
you left me to die in a metaphorical ditch and act like it was good for me

trackinfo.title: thank you to my hard drive, my mic stand, my plushies and Valve
trackinfo.lyrics:
I'm sorry I forgot to eat today, I've been wistful but that doesn't stop me from being.
I've been looking, barely looking at images of stuff, or was it videos? I'm not sure where I'm laying but it is deeply uncomfortable

trackinfo.title: the worst desk lamp
trackinfo.lyrics:
this pale blue hue that I've loved so much
it has been there with me throughout my childhood
it reminds me of it
but what is there to be reminded of? I know that's cheesy but I have never been a kid, I yearn for it every day

trackinfo.title: lightheaded~
trackinfo.lyrics:
the amount of breaths I have not actually breathed are insurmountable
have I ever taken a breath?

trackinfo.title: it has been ten times now, my skin erodes at the thought of leaving the window closed, although it's the only thing I know, it does not comfort me. I'm not sure what i have to do anymore, are these butterflies singing my name? or is the birds? I hope they can help me
trackinfo.lyrics:
I want to rip my eyes out of their fucking sockets and fix everything
the burns on my joy are overwhelming i can't unlock the doors
I am encircled by myself 
it has been ten now;
